title: The long and the short of long–term memory—a molecular framework

tldr.text: A single learning event initiates several memory processes with different time courses of retention, and the finding that long-term memory requires the expression, during learing, of additional genes makes it possible to analyse in molecular terms the induction and retention of long- term memory.
